full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Mandatory Solicitation Number
T8493-22-0015

## Product/Service Description
The Transport Canada agency, under the service requirement, seeks proposals for the modification or advance exchange of two (2) Honeywell SG-811 Symbol Generators.

## Technical Specifications
Refer to Annex A Statement of Work for detailed work specifications.

## Procurement Requirements
The procurement is an open bid solicitation process.

## Proposed Evaluation Criteria
Bids must clearly demonstrate a compliant bid with the lowest total evaluated cost.

## Desired Traders
Eligible traders are invited to submit proposals.

## Tender Requirements
The tender includes:

* Modification or advance exchange of two (2) SG-811 Symbol Generators
* Compliance with the work specifications outlined in the Annex A Statement of Work

## Contract Duration
The contract duration will commence on the date of contract award and end on 30 November 2022, inclusive.

## Contact Information
* Tanya Nadeau, Contracting Authority
* Telephone: 343-575-6684
* Email: tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents
Access the tender documents on the Canadas.tenderboard.ca website at:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/30/11e6b838cff0223cbf83500bfbdfb500/rfpet8493-22-0015.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/30/e165936521bc2e507596788f56e5579f/rfpf_t8493-22-0015.pdf

## Tender Submission
Please submit your bid proposal to the address mailed in the tender documents, on or before 14:00 (EST) on 15 September 2022. Bids received after the closing date and time will not be considered. Bidders must submit their bid in accordance with the instructions set out in the tender documents.

Questions should be directed to the contracting authority, Tanya Nadeau at the above address. It is responsibility of the bidder to ensure their bid is submitted prior to the deadline. 

The described rewritten proposal reduces information redundancy while maintaining essential information for potential bidders. The text adheres to government tender guidelines while facilitating easy comprehension of the procurement details.
